options.name: name
options.description: The name of the tag (1-100 characters)

options.name: content
options.description: The text to respond to this tag with (1-2000 characters)

options.name: ephemeral
options.description: Whether this tag response should only be visible to you (default false)

options.name: tag
options.description: The (current) name of the tag to edit. After entering, click the properties to edit above.

options.name: newname
options.description: The new name of this tag (1-100 characters)

options.name: content
options.description: The new text to respond to this tag with (1-2000 characters)

options.name: ephemeral
options.description: Whether this tag response should only be visible to you

options.name: tag
options.description: The name of the tag to delete
